snippet.title: Case of Dungeons (PC-98) Part 1
snippet.description:
Here is a very interesting game for the PC-98
developed by Studio K2 and released in 1993.

This isometric dungeon crawler has some unconventional
game mechanics but they do not detract from the
game-play at all. In fact they add to the strategic
element that is prominent in the battle system.

Rather than try to document it all here, I will
do commentary for part 2 explaining how the
game mechanics work.
